Text:
Did some research and hex comparing and there is no official change log information for this build anywhere and comparing shows that basicly the difference i see is the promo (The Tunnel)

It IS an official build though if you get the original .exe from filehippo like i did you will see it contains a valid digital signature (which becomes invalid soon as you patch the .exe) don't need it anyways lol
Thank you for this, VERY happy to downgrade back to ver. 2!

i figured others would agree v2 is better than v3
Less bloated crap etc
The apps for example, i had and disable them in the options and i also added this to my hosts file to block uTorrent from downloading "Apps"
127.0.0.1 apps.bittorrent.com

Goes with out saying dont click on check for updates and disable auto updates in the options ;)
if you're really not a repacker as you'd already mentioned, please help me to patch pdf2exe pro v3.0, l need it so much, and put in TPB, thanks a lot
or anyone who hase it full version, please upload in TBP, l really appreciate it so much, l search no one did it even in private torrent, l need it to make my ebook

If your reffering to some comments on other torrents around hell fuckin no im no repacker and they piss me off !
Im tired of kids on the web stealng shit from cracking groups and erasing the crackers name and putting their own in instead.. They know who they are, and they know better.

And my advice to you is post a request maybe in the forums or on a site that has crackers willing to to take requests. Sorry but i do not ;)

l see, sorry 4 that, l think before you're a patcher that can patch a program by your self so l ask 4 that proggy
that's okey l wanna try to another forum

thanks
xpmule, send me a pm on the forum when you get a chance please.

i said in the description that i added my name and date to the .exe and what i meant by that is i tagged the file internaly..
You will NOT see anything different when you run the program, the uTorrent GUI will look 100% exactly the same as the official release.

Also if people don't know what the DHT Patch is please google search it.
It can really come in handy, its a nice hack :)
Thank you for V2 Upload.. I hate V3 and quite frankly.. Bittorrent has been such a bitch lately so I thought I'd come back to good old uTorrent.. Again Thanks a bunch :)
